attributes.action: press fraud and tax evading MPs to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
While claiming for non-work related  items is reprehensible, such claims are nothing compared to outright fraud and tax evasion.

Those MPs who have claimed interest on "phantom mortgages", and those who have declared properties as second homes for allowances, but primary residences for Capital Gains Tax purposes, should resign immediately and fight a bi-election.

The Prime Minister should press those MPs to do the honourable thing and  resign immediately.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
